Quality Education.reason: The course is a 'required writing course' focused on developing skills in writing, reading, critical judgment, and communication, which are core components of quality education.
evidence: This is the first required writing course for students in NCCU's Department of English.
The course focuses on writing clear and correct essays, but at the same time, you should improve your speaking ability, your reading ability, cultural awareness...
to develop independent and critical judgment

Industry, Innovation and Infrastructure.reason: The course explicitly incorporates modern technology and innovation through the 'extensive use of AI' for feedback and learning, and teaches students to 'Use AI effectively and ethically'.
evidence: We will make extensive use of AI in this class for feedback and correcting your grammar and usage while writing.
Use AI effectively and ethically to improve your own writing.

Partnerships for the Goals.reason: The course fosters collaboration and partnership on a micro-level by teaching students to 'provide peer feedback for your classmates' and critique the work of others.
evidence: you will learn how to comment and provide peer feedback for your classmates
the skill to critique and provide helpful feedback on the essays of your classmates
